duties_responsibilities.duty: Architect, design and roll-out secret management solutions
Explore and make recommendations on security products
Follow Secure Development Lifecycle (SDL) standards and practices
Work with external Vendors to manage the backlog and roadmap
Integrate Security products in DevOps eco system products
Troubleshoot, diagnose, and fix the issues for application teams w.r.t Security product integrations
Work closely with Development teams to identify and address the security related matters
Work closely with Cyber Security Organization to update/implement policies, governance, and standards

education_certification.credential: Engineering Degree in Computer Science/Engineering, or equivalent professional experience, 8+ years of related experience in a professional role, with a Master’s degree
